titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on products containing (E)-N-Y(2-Chloro-1,3-thiazol-5-yl) methyl?-N-methylYoxido(oxo)hydrazono? methanediamine or N-Y(2-Chloro-1,3-thiazol-5-yl)methyl?-N-{(E)-(methylamino) Yoxido(oxo)hydrazono? methyl}-amine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on products containing (E)-N-Y(2-Chloro-1,3-thiazol-5-yl) methyl?-N-methylYoxido(oxo)hydrazono? methanediamine or N-Y(2-Chloro-1,3-thiazol-5-yl)methyl?-N-{(E)-(methylamino) Yoxido(oxo)hydrazono? methyl}-amine.
